The Ruby Eye

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 358
magic bonus [boosters]: +F
generates water gems [gw]: 2W per month
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], magiceye [magiceye])

Requires 15F to forge (F3)

By replacing his own eye with this fiery, eye-shaped ruby, a mage will become more powerful in Fire magic. Every now and again, the magic ruby will shed tears of magical Water gems.
